title: 10-Agent Haiku Swarm Deployment - NaviDocs Cloud Sessions
claim: 5 parallel cloud sessions (50 total Haiku agents) can deliver complete intelligence dossier + working MVP in 4 hours for Riviera Plaisance presentation

sources.description: Session coordination specification with agent numbering and dependencies
Feature extraction tool - 11 features pre-selected and prioritized
Generated agent task JSON from feature selector - 21 tasks, 53h estimate, 100% P0

sources.directive: Update agents.md with 10-agent swarm status + communication protocol + agent responsibilities

rationale.session_architecture: 5 sessions designed for parallel execution with sequential dependencies - Sessions 1,2,3,4,5 unblock each other in cascade
rationale.agent_pattern: 10 agents per session = 9 specialized workers + 1 synthesizer. Sessions 2,4,5 include 3-4 continuous helper agents (0A-0D) for cross-session support
rationale.time_optimization: 90 minutes (T+0 to T+45min): Parallel Phase 1 work with no dependencies. 60 minutes (T+45 to T+1h30): Phase 2 synthesis. 60 minutes (T+1h30 to T+2h30): Guardian validation. 90 minutes (T+2h30 to T+4h00): StackCP deployment + demo polish
rationale.token_efficiency: Haiku agents for mechanical work (market research, web scraping, citation generation, QA). Sonnet reserved for Guardian Council votes + complex synthesis. Estimated total: 150-200K tokens across all 50 agents

validation.tested_pattern: 5-agent StackCP deployment already validated in STACKCP_S2_SWARM_DEPLOYMENT.md
validation.scaling_factor: 10-agent expansion uses same prompts/coordination but with 5x parallelism. Session dependencies (polling + file handoff) proven in previous cloud sessions
risk_factors: Session 1 must complete in <45 min for cascade to succeed (critical path)
Guardian Council vote (Session 5 Phase 2) cannot execute until Sessions 1-4 deliver handoffs
If any session exceeds time budget, demo preparation gets compressed

dependencies.reason: All agents poll this file every 60 seconds for coordination
Polling trigger - Sessions 2,3,4 wait for this before Phase 2
Optional - synced between agents and local for real-time progress tracking

next_actions: Agent 1: Launch Session 1 Market Research (10 agents) - no dependencies
Agent 8: Monitor Session 1 progress - should complete ~T+45min
Agent 10: When S1 complete, unblock Sessions 2 Phase 2, 3 Phase 2, 4 Phase 2
Agent 5: Guardian QA Phase 2 launch when Sessions 1-4 deliver handoffs
git_commit: [AGENT-8] Update agents.md with 10-agent swarm deployment + communication protocol

audit_trail.notes: Initial citation creation for 10-agent swarm deployment
